title: "Logging onto chat service..."
body: I cant play with my friends and i cant write messeng in champio select...plz help

replies.body: issues with the chat server are usually due to connection issues with your network.  We have a[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that may help you troubleshoot this.  Please let me know if you have any questions, and I hope that helps!
this is happening all over eune cant be that

Correct, [EUNE servers are still experiencing technical difficulties.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GMBK2qYG-eune-summoners-riot-is-aware-of-your-login-connectivity-difficulties)

not help to me :( 
still not working :(
